abstract: Avalanches caused by heavy snow kill at least 124 people and destroy or damage 100 homes in northeastern Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: Avalanches caused by a heavy winter snow killed at least 124 people in northeastern Afghanistan, an emergency official said Wednesday, as rescuers clawed through debris with their hands to save those buried beneath.
snippet: Avalanches caused by a heavy winter snow killed at least 124 people in northeastern Afghanistan, an emergency official said Wednesday, as rescuers clawed through debris with their hands to save those buried beneath.
